comment.body:
You can also fix this issue with uBlock Origin:

1. Install uBlock Origin
2. Click the uBlock Origin icon, and got to the dashboard (click the grey bar in the opened panel)
3. Enable "I am an advanced user" in the uBlock Origin dashboard.
4. Click the uBlock Origin icon in your browser
5. Make the right column of the "3rd-party" row red so that 3rd-party party requests are blocked for say "127.0.0.1"
